speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: SCENE II. Before ALBANY's palace.

speaker: EDGAR
text_entry: Enter GONERIL and EDMUND

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Welcome, my lord: I marvel our mild husband

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Not met us on the way.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Enter OSWALD

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Now, where's your master'?

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Madam, within; but never man so changed.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: I told him of the army that was landed;

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: He smiled at it: I told him you were coming:

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: His answer was 'The worse:' of Gloucester's treachery,

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: And of the loyal service of his son,

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: When I inform'd him, then he call'd me sot,

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: And told me I had turn'd the wrong side out:

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: What most he should dislike seems pleasant to him;

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: What like, offensive.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: [To EDMUND]  Then shall you go no further.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: It is the cowish terror of his spirit,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: That dares not undertake: he'll not feel wrongs

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Which tie him to an answer. Our wishes on the way

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: May prove effects. Back, Edmund, to my brother;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Hasten his musters and conduct his powers:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: I must change arms at home, and give the distaff

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Into my husband's hands. This trusty servant

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Shall pass between us: ere long you are like to hear,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: If you dare venture in your own behalf,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: A mistress's command. Wear this; spare speech;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Giving a favour

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Decline your head: this kiss, if it durst speak,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Would stretch thy spirits up into the air:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Conceive, and fare thee well.

speaker: EDMUND
text_entry: Yours in the ranks of death.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: My most dear Gloucester!

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Exit EDMUND

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: O, the difference of man and man!

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: To thee a woman's services are due:

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: My fool usurps my body.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Madam, here comes my lord.

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Exit

speaker: OSWALD
text_entry: Enter ALBANY

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: I have been worth the whistle.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: O Goneril!

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: You are not worth the dust which the rude wind

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Blows in your face. I fear your disposition:

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: That nature, which contemns its origin,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Cannot be border'd certain in itself;

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: She that herself will sliver and disbranch

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: From her material sap, perforce must wither

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: And come to deadly use.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: No more; the text is foolish.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Wisdom and goodness to the vile seem vile:

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Filths savour but themselves. What have you done?

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Tigers, not daughters, what have you perform'd?

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: A father, and a gracious aged man,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Whose reverence even the head-lugg'd bear would lick,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Most barbarous, most degenerate! have you madded.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Could my good brother suffer you to do it?

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: A man, a prince, by him so benefited!

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: If that the heavens do not their visible spirits

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Send quickly down to tame these vile offences,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: It will come,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Humanity must perforce prey on itself,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Like monsters of the deep.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Milk-liver'd man!

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: That bear'st a cheek for blows, a head for wrongs;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Who hast not in thy brows an eye discerning

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Thine honour from thy suffering; that not know'st

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Fools do those villains pity who are punish'd

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Ere they have done their mischief. Where's thy drum?

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: France spreads his banners in our noiseless land;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: With plumed helm thy slayer begins threats;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Whiles thou, a moral fool, sit'st still, and criest

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: 'Alack, why does he so?'

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: See thyself, devil!

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Proper deformity seems not in the fiend

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: So horrid as in woman.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: O vain fool!

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Thou changed and self-cover'd thing, for shame,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Be-monster not thy feature. Were't my fitness

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: To let these hands obey my blood,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: They are apt enough to dislocate and tear

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Thy flesh and bones: howe'er thou art a fiend,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: A woman's shape doth shield thee.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Marry, your manhood now--

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Enter a Messenger

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: What news?

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: O, my good lord, the Duke of Cornwall's dead:

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Slain by his servant, going to put out

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: The other eye of Gloucester.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Gloucester's eye!

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: A servant that he bred, thrill'd with remorse,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Opposed against the act, bending his sword

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: To his great master; who, thereat enraged,

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Flew on him, and amongst them fell'd him dead;

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: But not without that harmful stroke, which since

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Hath pluck'd him after.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: This shows you are above,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: You justicers, that these our nether crimes

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: So speedily can venge! But, O poor Gloucester!

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Lost he his other eye?

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Both, both, my lord.

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: This letter, madam, craves a speedy answer;

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: 'Tis from your sister.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: [Aside]              One way I like this well;

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: But being widow, and my Gloucester with her,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: May all the building in my fancy pluck

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Upon my hateful life: another way,

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: The news is not so tart.--I'll read, and answer.

speaker: GONERIL
text_entry: Exit

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Where was his son when they did take his eyes?

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Come with my lady hither.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: He is not here.

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: No, my good lord; I met him back again.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Knows he the wickedness?

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Ay, my good lord; 'twas he inform'd against him;

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: And quit the house on purpose, that their punishment

speaker: Messenger
text_entry: Might have the freer course.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Gloucester, I live

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: To thank thee for the love thou show'dst the king,

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: And to revenge thine eyes. Come hither, friend:

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Tell me what more thou know'st.

speaker: ALBANY
text_entry: Exeunt
